bibl.title: Letter from the Editors of Outlook to Howard A. Kelly, July 24, 1907

div1.p: The Editors of Outlook forward a contribution for Kissinger to Kelly.

div1.head: Letter from the Editors of Outlook to Howard A. Kelly, July 24, 1907
div1.opener:
The Outlook
287 Fourth Avenue
New York
>July 24th, 1907.
Editorial Rooms
Cable Address
OUTLOOK NEW YORK
Dear Sir:
div1.p:
We received this morning in the inclosed let-
ter a check for ten dollars for the yellow fever hero
for whom you are receiving contributions. As this
was made out to our order, we find it simpler to
send you our own check in place of the same, which
we are also inclosing herewith.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, THE EDITORS OF THE OUTLOOK Mr. Howard A. Kelly,
1418 Eutaw Place,
Baltimore, Md.
